Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Thistle Barbican Shoreditch in London (London City Centre), you'll be convenient to Barbican Arts Centre and St. Paul's Cathedral. This spa hotel is close to London Bridge and Tower of London.

Rooms
Stay in one of 463 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. This hotel has 13 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Thistle Barbican Shoreditch in London (London City Centre), you'll be convenient to Barbican Arts Centre and St. Paul's Cathedral. This spa hotel is close to London Bridge and Tower of London.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Barbican Arts Centre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Museum of London - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Old Bailey - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
London Stock Exchange - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
St. Paul's Cathedral - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Royal Exchange - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
The Gherkin - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Russell Square - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
British Library - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Globe Theatre - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
King's College London - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Tate Modern - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
St Georgeâ€™s, Bloomsbury - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
The British Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
London Bridge - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 25.2 km / 15.7 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 41.6 km / 25.8 mi
London (LTN-Luton) - 43.6 km / 27.1 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 47.2 km / 29.4 mi

- FROM LCY DEPART ON HARTMANN ROAD AND TURN RIGHT ONTO CONNAUGHT ROAD A1011. AT THE FIRST ROUNDABOUT, TAKE THE FIRST EXIT ONTO HARTMANN ROAD A1011. AT THE NEXT ROUNDABOUT, TAKE THE SECOND EXIT ONTO CONNAUGHT BRIDGE A1020, AND AT THE NEXT ROUNDABOUT, TAKE THE SECOND EXIT ONTO VICTORIA DOCK ROAD A112. TAKE A LEFT ONTO PRINCE REGENT LANE A112, THEN LEFT AGAIN ONTO NEWHAM WAY A13, AND CONTINUE ONTO A13. BEAR LEFT ONTO BRAHAM STREET A11, TURN RIGHT ONTO MANSELL STREET A1211, AND CONTINUE ONTO A1211. TURN LEFT ONTO COMMERCIAL STREET A1202, BEAR LEFT ONTO WHITES ROW A1202, AND CONTINUE ONTO A1202. CONTINUE ONTO GREAT EASTERN STREET A10, THEN ONTO LEONARD STREET A5202, AND FINALLY ONTO A5202. AT THE ROUNDABOUT, TAKE THE SECOND EXIT ONTO OLD STREET A5201, AND TURN RIGHT ONTO CENTRAL STREET, AND YOU HAVE REACHED YOUR DESTINATION.- FROM LHR M4 - A4 FOLLOW SIGNS FOR CITY OF LONDON.- DIRECTIONS FROM THE NORTH M1 TO THE A1, FOLLOWING SIGNS TO CENTRAL LONDON. TURN RIGHT IN TO PENTONVILLE RD FOLLOW INTO CITY ROAD. TURN RIGHT INTO CENTRAL STREET,THE HOTEL IS ON THE CORNER OF LEVER AND CENTRAL STREET.- DIRECTIONS FROM THE SOUTH M23 ON THE A A23, FOLLOWING SIGNS TO THE CITY. FOLLOW SIGNS AROSS BLACKFRIARS BRIDGE. CONTINUE STRAIGHT FOR 1/2 MILE, ON FARRINGDON RD AND TURN INTO CLERKENWELL STREET. TURN LEFT INTO GOSWELL STREET AND LEFT AGAIN INTO LEVER STREET. THE HOTEL IS ON THE CORNER OF LEVER AND CENTRAL STREET.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early checkout will be charged 100% of the reserved booking. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.
